divs: Sighting DetailsAll this has been happening for the past month and a half...since the day we first spotted them each day more and more have been showing up....my wife and I have been outside the house and at my daughters mother and step father house when all of this has been going on....what made us notice them was the fact that they had blue,red,green and white lights but not like plane lights..and at certain times the lights will go crazy and they objects will hover and stay up in the sky sometimes looking like they are not moving but then they will get closer....we have even spotted one fly over our house and the dogs around our house will go crazy as if they sense something.....when we first started seeing these object we knew that they wasn't commercial, or military planes and not satelite's...two weeks ago we did a comparison and video taped these objects as well as a normal plane....but when we would zoom in the object looks like it was moving fast and the camera picture was steady...my wife is kinda scared yet a little excited about this finding...but I am also excited yet curious as if what are they planning or trying to find or observe...every time we lose sight of these objects they either fly away fast or look like they totally disappeared...we have also noticed that more and more of these objects have been showing up kinda like tactically the other night we counted about 10 or 12...we plan on observing again tonight...
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Killeen
There were no other sightings in Killeen on or around November 7th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
